feed.title: Track Awesome Ipfs Updates Weekly

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025
entry.content:
Apps

  • IPFS Share (⭐164) - Share files directly from the browser using IPFS.
  • Plebbit - Plebbit is a serverless, adminless, decentralised and infinitely scalable Social Media platform that is peer-to-peer and open-source.It's built on top of IPFS, Gossipsub and Blockchain namesystems (ENS, SNS).

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Nov 13 - Nov 19, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • Mintter (⭐168) - Mintter Hypermedia is an open system, built on IPFS, that allows communities to collaborate on content that is structured and deeply linked. All content in the system is cryptographically signed, versioned, and made permanent with IPFS.
  • Quiet - Privacy focused, end-to-end encrypted chat app that runs a private IPFS network over Tor connections. Desktop and mobile iOS and Android apps available.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Nov 13 - Nov 19, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 25 - Oct 01, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • Anytype - Anytype is a no-code, modular web builder designed to give ownership back to creators. It's built on our private, local-first, p2p-synced and open Anysync protocol.
  • orbitchat.dev (⭐27) - Ultra simple chatrooms on the web.

Tools

  • dScan (⭐43) - A browser extension that uploads the content to Web3.Storage and generates QR codes for CIDs.
  • Pin Tweet to IPFS (⭐31) - Web Extension which creates a WebArchiveZip of a tweet and adds to IPFS network.

Services & Platforms

  • dAppling - Hosting platform with automated deployments from GitHub to IPFS
  • Fileverse - Encrypted file sharing based on IPFS. Share any files with or without a wallet

Pinning services

  • 4EVERLAND - 4EVERLAND is a pinning service that provides IPFS infrastructure and tooling making it easier and faster to host frontends, store data/NFT/file and fetch data with IPFS.
entry.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Sep 25 - Oct 01, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 18 - Sep 24, 2023
entry.content:
Browsers

  • Agregore (⭐840) - A minimal web browser for the distributed web. Supports downloading/uploading data from IPFS using the browser's fetch() API
  • Brave - A privacy-focused browser with many future forward features.
  • galacteek (⭐168) - A multi-platform Qt5-based browser for the distributed web.

Apps

  • Durin - Mobile app for accessing and uploading content on the IPFS network.
  • IPFS-FPS (⭐6) - A completely decentralized first person shooter. Built with Unity, Fleek, Unstoppable Domans and Pinata.
  • killcord (⭐522) - A censorship resistant deadman's switch
  • Peer Web Site (⭐187) - Peer to Peer Web Site hosting at your fingertips! Send full featured HTML (incl. CSS, JS) sites from your browser and attach files eg. videos, images, etc.
  • Peergos (⭐2.2k) - End-to-end encrypted, peer-to-peer file storage and sharing.

Tools

  • git-remote-ipfs (⭐232) - push/pull repositories from/to IPFS.
  • gomobile-ipfs (⭐342) - IPFS and libp2p on Mobile, with Gomobile.
  • IPDR (⭐547) - IPFS-backed Docker Registry.
  • IPFS Setup Action (⭐21) - A GitHub Action to install and initialize go-ipfs to provision a cross-platform test environment on GitHub's CI platform.
  • ipfs-add-from-encrypted (⭐53) - Encrypt a file or directory with AES256 then add to IPFS.
  • ipfs-mount (⭐149) - Mount IPFS as a mapped drive on Windows.
  • ipfs-paste (⭐32) - Paste stdin and clipboard to IPFS.
  • ipfsecret (⭐26) - Encrypt and decrypt IPFS files with a secret passphrase.
  • IPLD Explorer (⭐126) - Explore the Merkle Forest from the comfort of your browser.
  • Tellit - Encrypt files before uploading them using a keypair or a passphrase.
  • VIPFS (⭐306) - Publish your Vue apps easily to IPFS.
  • youtube2ipfs (⭐24) - Download videos from YouTube (and similar video platforms) and add them to IPFS.

Services & Platforms

  • Fleek - Open Web development platform for building, hosting, and storing sites and apps on IPFS, Filecoin, and the Internet Computer.
  • Fission - Fission builds open source protocols and managed solutions that empower developers to construct scalable and secure software applications.
  • Peergos - Your private, but social, space online. Store and edit documents and media. Share files or folders with friends.

Pinning services

  • Filebase - Pinning data to IPFS can be hard. Filebase removes that complexity.
  • NFT.Storage - Free decentralized storage and bandwidth for NFTs on IPFS & Filecoin.
  • Web3.storage - Simple file storage with IPFS & Filecoin.
entry.summary: 26 awesome projects updated on Sep 18 - Sep 24, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Sep 11 - Sep 17, 2023
entry.content:
Apps

  • archiveweb.page (⭐1k) - A High-Fidelity Web Archiving Extension for Chrome and Chromium based browsers with support for IPFS.
  • brig (⭐574) - File synchronization with git like interface and FUSE filesystem.
  • Diffuse (⭐837) - Play music from your IPFS node, or any other cloud/distributed storage service you use.
  • IPFS Desktop (⭐6.3k) - IPFS Desktop gives you all the power of IPFS in a convenient desktop app: a complete IPFS node, plus handy OS menubar/taskbar shortcuts and an all-in-one file manager, peer map, and content explorer.

Tools

  • git-ipfs-rehost (⭐201) - A script to rehost your git repos in ipfs.
  • Git IPFS Remote Bridge (⭐25) - set of programs written in Python 3 which allow Git user to clone, push, fetch, self-host or release Git repositories over IPFS decentralized data storage system.
  • ipfs-publish (⭐67) - Continuous Delivery tool for delivery of static websites from Git providers to IPFS.
  • ipfs-video-gateway (⭐46) - Cloud-init your own IPFS gateway on a cloud provider and easily pin content through a simple web interface.
  • SimpleAsWater Bot (⭐13) - A twitter bot that adds, pins, unpins your tweets to public IPFS network using IPFS Cluster.

Services & Platforms

  • Ceramic - Ceramic combines IPFS content addressing with advanced cryptography and blockchain timestamps to guarantee security and verifiability of data.

Pinning services

  • Pinata - Build and manage your dapp through Pinata’s REST API and IPFS toolkit.
entry.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Sep 11 - Sep 17, 2023

entry.content:
Apps

  • ipfs-chat (⭐143) - Terminal-based, encrypted chatrooms. Allows private messaging & secure in-chat file/directory sharing. Server/broker-less (no signaling/rendezvous server needed). Works over LAN/internet(w/ NAT-traversal).

entry.title: Awesome Ipfs Updates on Jul 30 - Aug 05, 2018
entry.content:
Apps

  • Hardbin (⭐254) - Hardbin is an encrypted pastebin, with the decryption key passed in the URL fragment
  • InterPlanetary Wayback (⭐639) - Web Archive (WARC) indexing and replay using IPFS.
  • Interplanetary Wiki (⭐101) - Wiki built on top of IPFS
  • IPFessay - A simple way to publish uncensorable essays on IPFS.
  • PushToTalk - Push to Talk lets you edit audio essays and publish them with IPFS.

Tools

  • gatsby-plugin-ipfs (⭐115) - Adds support for deploying Gatsby websites to IPFS by ensuring that assets are relative.
  • http2ipfs (⭐44) - This is a simple webtool to add URLs to an IPFS node.
  • ipfs-companion (⭐2.1k) - Browser extension that simplifies access to IPFS resources.
  • ipfs-screencap (⭐49) - Capture screenshots, publish them to IPFS, and copy the link to the clipboard.
  • ipget (⭐408) - 🛰️ wget for IPFS: retrieve files over IPFS and save them locally.
  • IPRedirect (⭐8) - Browser userscript for redirecting IPFS/IPNS addresses to your local gateway. This should work on any browser that hasn't had an extension written for it yet and has support for userscripts.
entry.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jul 30 - Aug 05, 2018
